Private Litigation Case Title: Barrus v. Dick's Sporting Goods, Inc. et al
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/222904/dick-s-to-pay-up-to-15-5m-to-settle-ot-actions

Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of Riverside
Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/912262/000104746904028371/a2143240z10-q.htm

Description: Dick's Sporting Goods, The Sports Authority, and GSI Commerce Solutions agreed to cease all Internet sales of airsoft and BB guns into Massachusetts, and to pay a total of $20,000 in penalties in settlement of alleged violations of selling air-rifles to minors. The announcement did not indicate how much each company would pay. Here we assume the total was divided equally among them.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20080719152137/http://www.mass.gov/?pageID=cagopressrelease&L=1&L0=Home&sid=Cago&b=pressrelease&f=2008_01_04_bbgun_judgements&csid=Cago
